xten.name: value
xten.load:
<%
        const value = await database.inlineValue(node, context, xten);
        var _value = value;
        if (value) {
            if (node.attribs.summary) {
                const chars = parseInt(node.attribs.summary);
                _value = _value.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '').substring(0, chars);
            }
            node.text = _value;
        }
        %>
